mapper.select: SELECT t_client.`is_member` AS isMember, COUNT(0) AS isMemberCount FROM t_client GROUP BY t_client.`is_member`;

SELECT t_client.`dic_mci_type` AS dicMCIType, t_dictionary.`name` AS dicMCITypeName, COUNT(0) AS dicMCITypeCount FROM t_client LEFT OUTER JOIN t_dictionary ON (t_client.`dic_mci_type` = t_dictionary.`id`) GROUP BY t_client.`dic_mci_type`;
SELECT DISTINCT (t_client.`gender`) AS gender FROM t_client
SELECT DISTINCT (t_dictionary.`name`) AS dicNationName, t_dictionary.`id` AS dicNation FROM t_client,t_dictionary WHERE t_client.`dic_nation` = t_dictionary.`id`

SELECT client.name AS name, client.tel AS tel, client.idcard_num AS idcardNum, client.is_member AS isMember, client.member_points AS memberPoints, MAX(t_visit.`cost`) AS maxCost, client.all_cost AS allCost FROM t_client client LEFT OUTER JOIN t_visit ON (client.`id` = t_visit.`client_id`) GROUP BY client.`id` LIMIT 0, 10
